```{r}
library(DBI)
library(RSQLite)
DB_PATH <- "data/h4sci.sqlite3"
con <- dbConnect(RSQLite::SQLite(), DB_PATH)

response <- dbGetQuery(con, "SELECT * FROM responses")

dbDisconnect(con)

```



## General Understanding 

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
g <- gsub(",,",",",paste(response$general,collapse=","))
d <- data.frame(language = unlist(strsplit(g,",")))
gg <- ggplot(d, aes(language))
gg + geom_bar()
```
